alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 11:55PM CDT until March 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Guadalupe County in south central Texas... East central Bexar County in south central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1155 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Santa Clara to near Stinson Municipal Airport, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Randolph AFB, Stinson Municipal Airport, Kirby, McQueeney, St. Hedwig, China Grove, Marion, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Zuehl, Geronimo and Converse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
